backend/main.mo: Defines actor state, authorization mixin, and extensive types for BTC transfers, fees, reserve status, and diagnostics.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files covering styles, routing, hooks, components, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark OKLCH color tokens and global background/foreground behavior.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell mounting the React app with a root div and main script entry.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up router, query client, auth gate, admin guard, and main application layout and routes.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminAccess: UI card explaining failed admin access with principal display, copy button, diagnostics, and navigation actions.
Loading screen for admin verification with elapsed timer, masked principal, and retry/sign-out options.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminTroubl: Shows a warning card for non-admin authenticated users with their principal ID and options to copy it or retry the admin check.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles login and logout via Internet Identity, clearing caches and session parameters when signing out.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter and save their display name to complete profile setup.
frontend/src/components/balance/UsdEstim: Displays a USD estimate for a BTC amount or a loading/unavailable state if price data is missing.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Renders the main header with navigation, login controls, admin link logic, and user greeting based on profile data.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the overall app layout including header, admin troubleshooting banner, content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/transfers/bestPr: Defines structured best‑practice entries and text used for troubleshooting Bitcoin transfer issues.
frontend/src/components/transfers/BestPr: Provides searchable best-practices guidance with suggested topics, filtering, and expandable detailed entries.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Broadc: Expandable note explaining how transaction broadcasting works and warning users not to enter private keys.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Transf: Displays a sortable table of user transactions with type labels, date formatting, USD estimates, and a dialog for verifying transfer details.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Verify: Shows detailed status of a transfer request with live updates, copy-to-clipboard support, refresh controls, and troubleshooting navigation.
frontend/src/components/withdrawals/Admi: Renders an admin table for managing withdrawal requests, including marking paid, rejecting with reasons, and copying principal IDs.
Displays high‑level counts of pending, paid, and rejected withdrawal requests with summary cards and optional navigation to the inbox.
frontend/src/components/withdrawals/Exte: Collapsible developer note component showing PayPal and Stripe payout API examples with copy-to-clipboard actions.
frontend/src/components/withdrawals/With: Displays a sortable table of withdrawal requests with timestamps, amounts, methods, and status badges.
Summarizes counts of pending, paid, and rejected withdrawals and provides guidance on what the Paid status means.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFundedWithdrawalNo: Watches withdrawal status changes and triggers a toast when a request transitions to Paid, ensuring one notification per request.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines multiple React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user data, balances, Bitcoin transactions, and fees via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and custom theme variables, including light/dark palettes and component utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the root App component.
Displays admin identity, balance info with USD estimate, and lists available admin capabilities.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Implements the main admin dashboard for sending BTC, managing reserves, handling withdrawals, and viewing transactions.
frontend/src/pages/AiLotteryPage.tsx: Generates AI-assisted lottery outcomes using fallback data when live fetch fails, displaying results and errors.
frontend/src/pages/BuyCreditsPage.tsx: UI for submitting a Bitcoin txid and amount to purchase credits, showing current balance and USD estimate.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main wallet overview showing balance, price estimate, recent transactions, wallet info, and security notices.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays full transaction history with summaries of totals and an optional auto-open request ID.
frontend/src/pages/PuzzleRewardsPage.tsx: Static page describing puzzle rewards, currently disabled and not implemented in backend.
frontend/src/pages/SendBtcPage.tsx: Form to send BTC credits with fee estimation, validation, and outcome alerts including navigation to details.
frontend/src/pages/TransferTroubleshooti: Troubleshooting view for a specific transfer request with status, analysis, refresh, and retry options.
frontend/src/pages/WithdrawPage.tsx: Withdrawal form page that submits payout requests, displays balance and USD estimates, and shows withdrawal history with notifications for funded requests.
frontend/src/utils/adminStatusCache.ts: Provides localStorage-backed caching of admin status per principal with TTL and in-memory tracking for current-page verification.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Normalizes Send BTC backend errors into concise, user-friendly messages with specific handling for address, balance, and network issues.
frontend/src/utils/fundedNotificationSto: Tracks which withdrawal requests have already triggered 'paid' notifications using per-principal localStorage state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support and hash-based routing handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Project configuration snapshot describing app scope, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature metadata.
